long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless LinkedIn integration for Copper CRM.

LinkMatch Chrome extension for Copper has the following features:

1. Save LinkedIn profiles into Copper
2. Automatically shows which LinkedIn profiles(people or organizations) are in your CRM. 
3. Allows you to view and edit the profile info of the existed CRM profiles right in the LinkedIn, without switching to Copper.
4. LinkedIn messages sync with Copper.

.. and many more

Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- notifications: show notifications when profile action is completed
- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to Xing
- https://*.copper.com/* - to be able to make requests to Copper API
- https://ali-userassets-production.s3.amazonaws.com/* - for loading Copper images
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
